content:
davxy opened issue #3036:

Hi there,

looks like some feature flags are not documented here.

In particular I'm interested in the "fiber" feature. What it is supposed to do exactly?

Thanks for your awesome work.

bjorn3 commented on issue #3036:

I can't find a fiber feature declared in Cargo.toml.

davxy commented on issue #3036:

Sorry, my fault. "wasm-time" fiber is a package required by the async feature.

davxy closed issue #3036:

Hi there,

looks like some feature flags are not documented here.

In particular I'm interested in the "fiber" feature. What it is supposed to do exactly?

Thanks for your awesome work.
